column28: Helps a lot in many ways

ChatGPT is a tool that can have a net positive impact on my studying process by alleviating the load for various repetitive tasks, for example boilerplate. When well-designed, functions can be supplemented by something written by an LLM. In addition, ChatGPT can provide some sense of direction in case a question's wording is't specific enough, and asking it for a sample answer can often help find out what the assignment in question expects.
Speeds up the search for necessary information

column28:
Using ChatGPT can positively impact Your learning process as a Data Science student in several ways:

    Instant Access to Information: ChatGPT provides quick answers to complex questions, helping You understand concepts and methodologies in Data Science more efficiently.

    Code Assistance: ChatGPT can help debug code, suggest improvements, and provide code snippets, which is invaluable when You are working on assignments or projects.

    Learning New Concepts: ChatGPT can explain new or challenging concepts in simpler terms, provide examples, and offer additional resources for deeper understanding.

    Practice Problems: ChatGPT can generate practice problems and solutions, allowing You to test Your knowledge and improve problem-solving skills.

    Research Support: ChatGPT can assist in finding relevant research papers, articles, and references, making it easier to gather information for assignments and projects.

    Language Support: For non-native English speakers, ChatGPT can help translate technical terms and explanations, ensuring better comprehension of study materials.

    Personalized Learning: ChatGPT can adapt to Your learning pace and style, providing customized explanations and resources tailored to Your needs.

    Time Management: By quickly answering queries and providing resources, ChatGPT helps save time, allowing You to focus more on practical applications and in-depth study.

Overall, using ChatGPT as a learning tool can enhance Your understanding, efficiency, and confidence in Data Science.
Providing outlines for writing reports, helping me paraphrase sentences and helping me troubleshoot code
Accelerates understanding of complex things, simplifies routine tasks

ChatGPT eases the searching process and provides more or less reliable answers to any intricate question. However, the positivity of the impact it gives strongly rely on the person studying. It is important to analyze and properly read the information it gives.

1. Time-saving: ChatGPT can provide quick answers and explanations, saving students time when researching or studying, especially when facing tight deadlines.
2. Reduced anxiety: For students hesitant to ask questions in class, ChatGPT provides a low-pressure environment where they can seek clarification and assistance without fear of judgment.
3. Enhanced self-confidence: ChatGPT empowers students by providing valuable tools and resources that enhance their learning experience, ultimately boosting their self-confidence.
Makes it easier to grasp scientific concepts

column28: in validating my assumptions and in helping me find the main bullets
Provide some ideas for essays and non-technical tasks. I don't use ChatGPT to solve complex problems (algorithms, for example), because I spend more time to debug them than if I wrote code by myself.

ChatGPT is a tool that can help you learn and accumulate information at an extremely fast speed if used properly. The issue with it comes if students use it to copy and paste. ChatGPT is not even good when you try to copy and paste. The good of ChatGPT comes after you learn how to create good prompts and when you use it as a full time assistant, asking him when you have issues understanding a concept, an issue, or any other thing that requires outside information(e.g. internet, books, etc.)

The main ways I used ChatGPT in my academic years was: 
- explaining things from class I did not understand 
- summarise chapters of books I had to read in order to accumulate the information faster
- debug my code faster by sending the code and explaining the problem with it.
- generating creative ideas when I needed them(e.g. engaging titles for papers)
Structuring academic papers. Automatically doing redundant work such as citations and transcriptions. Accesses the web to find all relevant sources for me and summaries them perfectly.
Guiding me what to focus on

column28: Saving my time for writing documents (report - when you have the results and you need to describe everything else), documentation, official emails (especially in another language).
It helps me find bugs faster, find necessary things more quickly than going through all the documentation, suggest names for my functions, and give ideas on how I can improve them.

Personally I am more a fan of browsing the web for answers, blog posts, and articles.
However I can see how for someone else ChatGPT may help them understand concepts.
It is quicker to ask chatgpt for a solution to my general problem. It then provides a few algorithms with names and then i can start researching those algorithms, also using other sources than ai.
ChatGPT helps me reduce the manual labour work of sentence formation and checking for grammatical errors, it is basically a one stop solution for academic purposes.
